name: Eldery Escort
description:
Stay  close to the elderly person to make them walk. Be aware of incoming trucks, they come from all directions! (Yes they unfortunately are not good with traffic laws). Help as many elders you can without dying (or getting them killed) and increase your highscore!

Controls:

  • Keyboard:
    • WASD or arrow keys to move
    • R to respawn
    • RETURN/ENTER for next stage
  • Gamepad
    • D-pad to move
    • SELECT to respawn
    • START for next stage

This is just a silly little thing I made to improve my unity skills. The gameplay is not meant to be serious, and involves good RNG in order to get a high score.
